description: a(n) = Catalan(n) * Product a(k), k = 0 . . n-1.
references: D.-Z. Du and F. K. Hwang, Combinatorial Group Testing and Its Applications, World Scientific, 2nd ed., 2000; p. 36.
J. W. Moon and M. Sobel, Enumerating a class of nested group testing procedures, J. Combin. Theory, B23 (1977), 184-188.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
crossrefs: See A028580 for another version. Cf. A000108, A003046.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
